content: {A思考}You gave it your all today, and now it's finally... time to calculate — uh, to enjoy the fruits of your labor.

content: Now I can't help but feel even more excited. Try watering it with the jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> you just got! I wonder what new changes might bloom on the Luca Arbor...
